title: [Feat]: Add documentation about how to run multiple instances of the app
body:
### Describe the feature

Add documentatoin about how to run multiple instances of the app.

### Motivation

Every now an again, someone will ask about been able to run the app in multiple instances. 

It is possible to archive this using some config arguments and environment variables, whoever, the how to do it, is not documented other than in comments across multiple issues.

This ticket is to find a way to document this.

### Alternatives

Keep it as it is. 

### Additional context

_No response_
